Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus, within a moulded rim, with a laurel-wreath tied at the top; at the bottom is a small rosette. Within the base-ring is the impressed name FAVST; above it is an upside-down alpha with a curved stroke below it. Covered with a red-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1905.bis)
